PKR. 150,000 - 200,000/Month
Job Description
About Company
 Share this job

We are hiring a Credentialing & Growth Specialist for placement with a leading U.S.-based mental health platform that connects licensed therapists with patients, primarily through Medicaid. With over 90 clinicians onboard, this role is critical in ensuring therapists are properly enrolled and credentialed with insurance providers so they can serve patients seamlessly.

This is not a medical belling company job. It’s a career path for someone who wants to take ownership of credentialing, optimize systems, and eventually build and lead the credentialing department. You will also work closely with developers and operations to streamline processes and set the foundation for organizational growth.

Key Responsibilities

Enroll, credential, and re-credential licensed therapists with insurance networks

Manage and maintain credentialing documentation and compliance records

Assist with smooth onboarding of new therapists

Ensure compliance with payer requirements and regulations

Optimize credentialing processes and workflows for efficiency and scalability

Collaborate with internal teams to improve systems and reporting

Take initiative with a growth-hacking mindset (0 to 1) to set up a department for long-term expansion

What We Offer

Salary: Market competetive starting base pay plus performance based increments

Premium benefits: gym membership, fuel allowance, phone allowance

Professional coaching & career counseling

Clear growth opportunities into leadership and departmental ownership

Important Must Haves

Must speak fluent English with a strong American or neutral accent (strictly no Indian or Pakistani accents)

Prior credentialing/enrollment/insurance affiliation experience is required

Detail-oriented, proactive, and able to work independently

Tech-savvy and quick learner

Enrollment Management
Organized and Multitasking
Highly Detail Oriented

1704862.title: Sales Agent – Truck Acquisitions Job, Sahiwal, USA Quicksolutions - ROZEE.PK
1704862.description:
Sales Agent – Truck Acquisitions
USA Quicksolutions 
Sahiwal,
Pakistan
Apply Now
Posted 7 hours ago
13 views
Report Job
Job Description
About Company
 Share this job

We are seeking a motivated & results-oriented Sales Agent to drive our truck acquisition efforts. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying, evaluating, and closing deals to acquire used or new trucks that meet our quality, cost, and operational standards. You’ll work closely with our operations & maintenance teams, inspect vehicles, negotiate with sellers, and ensure the procurement process is efficient and profitable.

Key Responsibilities

Prospect, identify, and establish relationships with sellers: fleet owners, dealerships, auctions, private individuals, or wholesalers.

Inspect & evaluate trucks: check condition, mileage, maintenance history, value depreciation, compliance with specifications.

Negotiate prices, terms, and delivery schedules with sellers.

Work collaboratively with operations/maintenance teams to assess repair/refurbish costs, total cost of ownership, and resale potential.

Maintain detailed records of potential and acquired vehicles (e.g., inspection reports, cost breakdowns, seller communications).

Meet targets for number of trucks acquired, budget limits, and quality standards.

Keep up with market trends: prices, demand/supply, regulatory or compliance changes affecting truck acquisition.

Ensure due diligence on documents: registration, ownership, legal compliance.

Follow company procurement policies and ethical standards.

Qualifications & Skills

Prior experience in truck/vehicle buying, sales, fleet management or a similar field is highly preferred.

Good technical understanding of commercial trucks (engine, chassis, maintenance, etc.) or ability to quickly learn.

Strong negotiation, persuasion and interpersonal skills.

Excellent organisational skills; ability to manage multiple deals simultaneously.

Good analytical skills: evaluating cost/benefit, estimating repair costs, assessing resale values.

Ability to travel (site visits, inspections).

Valid driver’s licence (if required in your area).

Strong written & spoken communication skills in [relevant languages].

Integrity, attention to detail, and ability to work independently.

Sales Acquisitions

This role combines strategic prospecting, client engagement, and market analysis to expand the organization’s client base and strengthen its position in the healthcare services market.

Identify, research, and pursue new business opportunities within the healthcare and medical billing sector.

Develop and execute strategies to generate leads and secure contracts with healthcare providers, clinics, and physician practices.

Conduct presentations and product demonstrations to prospective clients, effectively communicating service offerings and value propositions.

Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with clients and key stakeholders.

Collaborate with internal teams (operations, billing, and customer service) to ensure seamless onboarding and service delivery.

Job Description
About Company
 Share this job

We are a growing software company dedicated to delivering scalable, secure, and high-performance solutions. We are looking for a talented Golang + Java Developer with 2–3 years of hands-on experience who is passionate about backend development and building enterprise-grade applications.

What You’ll Do

Design, develop, and maintain backend services using Golang and Java.
Build and optimize REST APIs and microservices.
Integrate with relational and non-relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
Ensure code quality through unit testing, debugging, and peer reviews.
Collaborate with front-end and DevOps teams for smooth deployment.
Follow secure coding practices and optimize applications for scalability and performance.

What We Offer

Competitive salary – 200,000 PKR
Paid time off and flexible working environment
Performance-based growth and career advancement
Annual bonuses and recognition
Work with modern tools and cloud technologies

What We’re Looking For

3–4 years of professional experience in Golang and Java
Strong understanding of OOP, data structures, and algorithms
Experience with REST APIs and microservices architecture
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) is a plus
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
Team player with excellent communication skills

1699282.title: Sales Developement Representative Job, Lahore, TalenTecHub Pvt Ltd - ROZEE.PK
1699282.description:
Sales Developement Representative
TalenTecHub Pvt Ltd 
Lahore,
Pakistan
Apply Now
Posted 6 days ago
632 views
Report Job
Job Description
About Company
 Share this job

TalenTecHub is looking for a driven and knowledgeable Sales Development Representative (SDR) to join its team. The primary focus of this role is to engage with cold/ warm leads, pitch our services, book an appointment or/ and close deals. The ideal candidate must have working knowledge of Sales Call, Social Media Marketing, Google PPC, and basic Coding Languages to effectively communicate and consult with prospects.

Key Responsibilities:

Make calls and follow-ups with cold/ warm leads to convert them into paying clients.
Pitch services confidently an including Web Development, Social Media Marketing, SEO, Google PPC, and Authority Marketing.
Identify prospects’ needs and propose the right solutions aligned with their business goals.
Handle objections, answer technical queries, and provide strategic recommendations.
Collaborate with internal teams to stay updated on services and strategies.
Maintain accurate lead records, status updates, and communications in the CRM.
Consistently meet and exceed sales targets and KPIs.

Requirements:

Proven experience in a Sales or SDR role with a track record of closing deals.
Must have a knowledge of Social Media Marketing strategies and platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).
Must have an understanding of Google PPC, keyword targeting, campaign setup, and optimization.
Basic understanding of coding languages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) to explain technical services effectively.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Self-motivated and target-driven.

What We Offer:

Competitive base salary + commission upon deal closing.
Growth opportunities within the company.
A dynamic and supportive work environment.

If you’re a confident communicator with a passion for closing deals and helping businesses grow, we’d love to hear from you.
